citeinfo.title: Submerged Aquatic Vegetation (SAV) in RI Coastal Waters (2006)
citeinfo.othercit: Suggested bibliographic reference: RIGIS, 2013. Submerged Aquatic Vegetation (SAV) in Rhode Island Coastal Waters (2006); SAV06. Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System, URL: http://www.rigis.org, Environmental Data Center, University of Rhode Island, Kingston, Rhode Island (last date accessed:: 2 October 2014).

descript.abstract: Eelgrass and other habitat polygons for Narragansett Bay delineated from aerial photography from August 2006. Eelgrass was mapped to determine trends in eelgrass abundance and distribution since the last eelgrass mapping project in 1996.
descript.purpose: Eelgrass and other habitat polygons for Narragansett Bay.

idinfo.useconst: These data are shared under the RIGIS license agreement, which can be viewed below: This dataset is provided 'as is.’ The producer(s) of this dataset, contributors to this dataset, the Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) consortium, the State of Rhode Island, and the University of Rhode Island do not make any warranties of any kind for this dataset, and are not liable for any loss or damage however and whenever caused by any use of this dataset.Please acknowledge both RIGIS and the primary producer(s) of this dataset in any derived products. Versions of the RIGIS logo suitable for both printed and web-based products are available at http://www.rigis.org/logos.Additional Use Constraints from Originator:These data DO NOT preclude a site specific visit for future coastal permitting purposes.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.4.1.5686

citeinfo.title: Report on the Analysis of True Color Aerial Photography to Map and Inventory Zostera marina L. in Narragansett Bay and Block Island, Rhode Island

attracc.attraccr: Attributes were internally QA/QC'd. No known errors exist. See attribute table for indication of accuracy of identification of eelgrass beds.

dataqual.logic: Data are consistent with 1:5000 RIDOT 03-04 orthophotography. Delineations were done by "heads-up" digitizing on 1:12000 orthophotography from James W. Sewall Co.

horizpa.horizpar: Listed accuracy of source DOQQs from James W. Sewall is +/- 50 feet. However accuracy is believed to be closer to +/- 20ft based on overlays of 1:5k datasets and field determination of polygon edges using WAAS enabled GPS.

citeinfo.title: 2006 NBNERR - Save the Bay - URI 1:12,000 Digital True Color Orthophotography

srcinfo.srccitea: 2006 NBNERR - Save the Bay - URI 1:12,000 Digital True Color Orthophotography

procstep.procdesc: Orthophotography, prints, and transparencies of Narragansett Bay were collected by James W. Sewall Co on August 5th, 2006. All three formats were used for interpretation of eelgrass beds. Initial interpretations were done and delineated by heads up digitizing on the Sewall orthophotography (1:12000 scale and 0.5m pixel resolution). These delineations were taken into the field and ground truthed using a Trimble GeoXH and gps enabled tablet pc. Deep water edges of eelgrass beds were determined using underwater video equipment, fathometer signals, boat observations using a view scope, and in some instances, divers. Once determined, the original polygon was then re-digitized in the field using the GPS enabled tablet pc or back in the lab using Trimble GeoXH data. Ground-truthing was completed in the summer of 2007.

procstep.procdesc: Data contributed to RIGIS by the University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center. Metadata were reviewed, updates made to content, RIGIS distribution information added.
